backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/DEPLOYED_URL.md: Template file for recording the latest Internet Computer deployment URL, canister ID, and verification status.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Detailed checklist for deploying to a new IC canister and verifying routing, deep links, and content.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file that restores deep link URLs before React mounts and loads the main app script.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that captures the original URL and redirects to root for client-side routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with landing and celebration routes wrapped in a ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Cele: Renders animated balloons, stars, and hearts with reduced-motion handling for the celebration page.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Conf: Shows a timed confetti burst animation with reduced-motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/celebration/useP: Hook that reads the user's reduced‑motion preference via matchMedia.
frontend/src/components/CopyLinkButton.t: Button that copies the current page URL to the clipboard and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/GeneratedArt.tsx: Simple image component plus constants referencing generated asset paths.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingT: Template selector UI using tabs to switch between landing variants.
frontend/src/components/landing/template: Elegant birthday landing layout with floating accents and a navigation button.
Playful animated birthday landing with hearts, stars, and a celebrate button.
Modern split‑layout birthday template with gift icon and navigation button.
frontend/src/content/birthdayMessage.ts: Exports a long personalized birthday message string.
frontend/src/content/routes.ts: Defines shared route constants for landing and celebration pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity with react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, state, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom celebratory color variables and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint that mounts React with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CelebrationPage.tsx: Renders the birthday celebration page with visuals, message content, navigation back to landing, and a copy-link button.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays a template selector and renders one of three landing page templates, with a copy-link button.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, typography, container settings, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, existing features, and metadata for deployment and routing verification tasks.
